songs.title: Ok Bet
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Bet
Ok bet
Yuh
Bet
Bet at last

[Chorus]
Bet, ok bet
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Moving fast, Louie bags
Money long, bet at last
Bet, ok bet
Bet, ok bet

[Verse 1]
Ice in my cup, mix with the tea
Drink and I'm drunk, lit off the weed
Drip after drip, wet like a seed
Tip after tip, ass like for free
Pop percocet, feel like Hercules
She ain’t work for you but she work for me
I got work to do, I've been up since 3
Everything in gold, Everything-

[Chorus]
Bet, ok bet
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Bet, ok bet
Yeah, yuh
Moving fast, Louie bags
Money long, bet at last
Bet, ok bet
Bet, ok bet

[Verse 2]
Back in this bitch, back with the drip
Aye
Back with the fizz, back with the hits
Yeah
Back with your bitch, back and I'm lit
Aye
Back in the VIP, aye sip after sip
All of these hoes with me, [?] notice me
All of them fuck with me, I got a hoe or two
Roll with the mob, money, count the guap
Pull up in the lot, aye, talk in the [?]

[Bridge]
Drug after drug, deal after deal
Pop after pop, pill after pill
Got me moving fast, I got Louie bags
Yuh
Money long, yeah bet at last
Aye drug on drug, aye deal on deal
Yuh
Pop on pop, pill on pill
Yuh
Moving fast, Louie bags
Money long, bet at last

[Chorus]
Bet, ok bet
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Bet, ok bet
Yeah
Bet, ok bet
Bet, ok bet
Aye, yeah
